meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Vince Scott Carol Jackson Jim Ryan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #612.

td.p: Vince Scott, a physician originally from Detroit, Michigan
Carol Jackson, a teacher originally from Glasgow, Scotland
Jim Ryan, a writer from Alexandria, Virginia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $6,050)

tr.td: SAN FRANCISCO
(Alex: Wonderful city!)
BEAUTY SECRETS
NAME THAT TEAM
ROCK 'N ROLL
GHOSTS
DOUBLE TALK

the south
